name: Distracted by the Clouds..
description:
Oftentimes, the mind can get real messy.. 

With all those external factors in life, I spend time thinking about things I need not to and should not to..

It gets harder and harder just to have time to myself, just myself..

One day, I looked up into the sky. I saw the clouds, I saw the freedom it has, and I envied the clouds. I don't know how long I spent looking at them, maybe, minutes.. maybe, hours.. it didn't really matter to me at that point.. 

I got totally distracted by the clouds.. then I felt it.. I felt my mind was still, my vision became so clear, I didn't think about anything else, at that moment, I was complete.. I am complete..

A visual motion I made through the study of Perlin Noise and Flow Field.

//Made with processing using java library.

//1200*800px
